decisions.winning_party: Three Affiliated Tribes of Fort Berthold Reservation

first_party: Three Affiliated Tribes of Fort Berthold Reservation

advocates.advocate_description: for an Indian tribe such as petitioner to avail itself of the jurisdiction of North Dakota courts as a plaintiff, it must also accept the jurisdiction of those courts when it is properly named as a defendant in them
